name: Arkadimon_Ultimate
description: Arcadiamon (Mega) is a Mysterious Beast Digimon. It is a cursed Digimon artificially created based on the data of various Digimon. Its nature is to evolve by absorbing its opponent's data, but it is unclear if it possesses any sense of self. Because these details are unknown, it is currently being investigated, but it's thought that Arcadiamon's existence is the greatest threat to the Digital World , and must never be.
